snippet: Dan Roundfield, a three-time N.B.A. All-Star in the early 1980s, drowned off the southern tip of Aruba after he and his wife, Bernie, were caught in rough surf while swimming.
abstract: Dan Roundfield, a three-time NBA All-Star in the early 1980s, drowns off the southern tip of Aruba after he and his wife Bernie get caught in rough surf while swimming; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Dan Roundfield, a three-time N.B.A. All-Star in the early 1980s, drowned off the southern tip of Aruba after he and his wife, Bernie, were caught in rough surf while swimming.

headline.seo: Former N.B.A. Star Dan Roundfield Drowns in Aruba
headline.main: Former N.B.A. Star Drowns in Aruba
